subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships
Street Sense (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Curlin, a 3-year-old son of Smart Strike, did his best to make everyone forget the unfortunate sideshows that surrounded his victory in the Classic.
snippet: Curlin, a 3-year-old son of Smart Strike, did his best to make everyone forget the unfortunate sideshows that surrounded his victory in the Classic.
